DOC.brief_summary: Thrombus outcome data collect retrospectively 2011-2012 historical baseline SoC oral VKA ( Vitamin K Antagonist ( ) treatment patient nonvalvular AF atrial flutter document LA/ LAA thrombi transesophag-eal echocardiography ( TEE ) . The study company-sponsored , global , multi-center , retrospective , non-interventional study . Patients suffer hemodynamically stable nonvalvular AF atrial flutter diagnose LA/ LAA thrombus January 1st , 2011 December 31st , 2012 identify screen review medical record include registry . Retrospective patient data collect May 2nd , 2013 May 2nd , 2014 . The observation patient cover period diagnosis LA/ LAA thrombus end-of-treatment TEE follow 3-12 week SoC anticoagulation ( AC ) therapy . If end-of-treatment TEE perform 3-12 week AC therapy , observational period end 12 week diagnosis late . If one TEE perform treatment , thrombus outcome collect last TEE perform within 12 week treatment start .
